homepage.title: Tatami Labs
homepage.subtitle: The Journey to Weave a Story
homepage.description: Connecting global minds with Japan's ultimate masters through deep conversation journeys

taglines.joy: What makes a master laugh after 40 years of dedication?
taglines.warmth: Behind every gentle smile lies a profound story...
taglines.contemplation: The weight of tradition sometimes brings tears...
taglines.moved: When passion meets purpose, hearts are moved...
taglines.revelation: Some discoveries change everything you thought you knew...
taglines.wonder: The moment when the impossible becomes possible...
taglines.awe: What secrets do the hands of a true master hold?

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Beyond Tourism, Into Truth
philosophy.description: We create genuine, equal dialogues - not performances. Participants are 'welcomed visitors,' not 'tourists,' engaging in authentic exchanges with masters. This is a 'spiritual restart.'

equality.title: Equal Exchange
equality.description: Masters and visitors meet as equals in dialogue

respect.title: Cultural Respect
respect.description: Honoring traditions while embracing new perspectives
